ygData.msgSnippet: Check out: http://gameznet.com/eq/ for a lot of gaming needs... also there s a new NEcromancer newsletter here: http://www.doomguild.com/monitor/ That should
ygData.messageBody:
Check out:

http://gameznet.com/eq/

for a lot of gaming needs... also there's a new NEcromancer newsletter here:

http://www.doomguild.com/monitor/

That should turn out interesting...

Malark, Dark'Fier Ravens, Karana SErver

> -----Original Message-----
> From: johnathan spectre [mailto:jspectre@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 9:43 AM
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Necro Spells..?
>
>
> From: "johnathan spectre" <jspectre@...>
>
>
> Does anyone know of a comprehensive list of Necromancer
> spells, what they are
> and what they do? (And where to get them in Neriak if they've
> been keeping
> track.) I'm a new player to EQ and only been on a week or so,
> finally made it
> to level 4 and am not sure what the listed spells do other
> than Leering
> Corpse. It would help make my purchase decisions with my
> limited funds.
>
> Thanks!
